english.segment1: The fight is over, the bright lights turned somehow. The strength I have is running out, the current pulls me down
english.segment3: Is anybody out there who's cold and incomplete inside. I can hear Him calling. Come and follow me, my child
english.segment4: The twilight turns to day, with all your love displayed. The stars they bow in awe, when the lost return to you
english.segment5: Draws up my heart deep from the well. I know He's finding every lost and broken dream
